channel.title: CVE Feed for Tips and Tricks HQ -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tips and Tricks HQ -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-48285|2024-06-04T10:23:00.172Z -- Tips and Tricks HQ -- Stripe Payments
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Tips and Tricks HQ Stripe Payments allows Code Injection.This issue affects Stripe Payments: from n/a through 2.0.79.

item.title: CVE-2024-30527|2024-05-17T08:20:59.609Z -- Tips and Tricks HQ -- WP Express Checkout (Accept PayPal Payments)
item.description: Improper Validation of Specified Quantity in Input vulnerability in Tips and Tricks HQ WP Express Checkout (Accept PayPal Payments) allows Manipulating Hidden Fields.This issue affects WP Express Checkout (Accept PayPal Payments): from n/a through 2.3.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-33591|2024-04-29T10:10:52.661Z -- Tips and Tricks HQ -- Easy Accept Payments
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Tips and Tricks HQ Easy Accept Payments.This issue affects Easy Accept Payments: from n/a through 4.9.10.
